channel.title: Not autoing with aryan
channel.description: :cool: Do you get banned if you log in with aryan not auto? How silly are jagex if you do because you are not braking any rules apart from having a deobed client :P

item.title: Not autoing with aryan
item.dc:creator: @Jake08 Jake08
item.description:
@Jake08 wrote:

Using anything besides going directly to runescape and playing increases your chances of being banned. It’s just a risk, which most of us understand. If you want to be completely safe, just use the runescape.com

item.title: Not autoing with aryan
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

[quote=“Mmmk, post:1, topic:482”] Do you get banned if you log in with aryan not auto?
How silly are jagex if you do because you are not braking any rules apart from having a deobed client :P[/quote]

That’s breaking several points of Rule Seven, not to mention the IP violations.

* programs that attempt to communicate directly with the RuneScape game worlds. * programs that monitor, modify or decrypt the communications between the RuneScape client and the RuneScape worlds. * programs that generate input to the RuneScape client. This includes programs that automatically move the mouse pointer or generate mouse clicks or key presses. * modified versions of the RuneScape client. Reverse engineering the RuneScape client is strictly prohibited. Using a modified version of the RuneScape client is not permitted.

On a side note, doesn’t the RuneScape client communicate directly with the game worlds?

Read full topic
